GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
soc: qcom: ocmem: Fix refcount leak in of_get_ocmem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 07aea6819d569d1e172227486655e4fb5bd4cdb9, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 88c1e9404f1deee02e52d13aae3d9ee2cabd66f5. For more details please see the references link.
